title: The Spiral Awakening
story_summary: Citizens unlock Halden's secret code and break the Council's grip on the city. BCI scores now shift in the open. Neighborhoods gather, debate, and take charge of decisions together. Council leaders are forced to face the people as Stenograd turns to self-rule.

official.headline: Community Open Forums
official.anchor_line: Neighborhoods launch public forums to discuss local civic matters.
official.contextual_reframing: Civic engagement grows as communities demonstrate adaptability and shared responsibility.

official.headline: System Scores Shift
official.anchor_line: BCI scoring temporarily transitions as communities manage access and services directly.
official.contextual_reframing: Stenograd infrastructure adapts seamlessly to support transparent and collaborative management.

official.headline: Cooperation Takes Hold
official.anchor_line: Residents introduce open, rotating management in districts, building a new spirit of cooperation.
official.contextual_reframing: Collective initiative and resilience reinforce stability, with Stenograd citizens leading shared self-governance.

underground.headline: Secrets Unsealed
underground.anchor_line: Word leaks of new assembly codes escaping the Council's grip.
underground.contextual_reframing: Some finally crack the BCI's shell, sharing the keys that keep us all in line. This time, truth spreads faster than state edits.

underground.headline: Central Control Falls
underground.anchor_line: Neighborhoods hijack BCI scores - Council authority evaporates overnight.
underground.contextual_reframing: Suddenly, the algorithm can't punish or reward. Ordinary people debate who gets what. Quiet fear turns to loud possibility.

underground.headline: Real Power - Us
underground.anchor_line: Rotating citizen councils now run Stenograd, not the silent system.
underground.contextual_reframing: It's not propaganda - just honest work and voices, face to face. Mutual aid becomes real as the Council fades, and we finally see each other in full light.
